item.title: Hi Im The Owner Of CammyPvp
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’d recommend you read the rules of this forum. You are not allowed to advertise your server/website.

edit: This is the second time i’ve moderated you for advertising. Do it again and I’ll just temporarily ban your account.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi Im The Owner Of CammyPvp
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“Fuse, post:11, topic:386558”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=482325.msg3532409#msg3532409 date=1300280026]

i dont think the real owner of cammypvp had a single digit iq

LOL

Lod’d, i wonder how is this kid getting money for “His” website?

isent it obvious? he begged his mom.

also your grammar fails

[quote]the rules are.
not curse.
not ask for admin, mod, co-owner, owner.
not threaten anyone else’s password account.
not threatening.
There are more rules soon.[/quote]
[/quote]
That’s rich coming from someone who spells “isn’t” as “isent” and with total disregard for capital letters and use of punctuation.[/quote]

Damn, you beat me to it! I was just about to point that out.

Read full topic
